comments:
2023 High School Reunion Tournament final game 1.

A production error made the final scores visible during Mayim's opening monologue.

clues.clue: Lombardy's northern reaches are occupied by the Lepontine, Rhaetian & Orobic these mountains

This duo in the title of a Stevenson novel are actually the same guy

Armaments-wise, Plains Indians had a gull-wing style of these, which they could use on horseback--it takes 2 hands. You try it

To many people, this small mammal was a trickster god; to the Powhatan, it was a creator named Ahone
"I'm stuck like a dope with a thing called hope" in the "South Pacific" song about a cockeyed pessimist

As Shakespeare put it so eloquently, "Parting is such sweet joy"

Physical therapist & kinesiotherapist are 2 careers within this field that specializes in athletic injuries

This device delivers an electrical shock to correct an abnormal heartbeat in cases of cardiac arrest

Sheerios
Livies
BTS has its Army & she has her Navy
Hooligans

In this classic of American lit, the mischievous title boy lives with Aunt Polly, who opens the novel by calling his name

final_jeopardy.clue: The busiest passenger port in the U.K., it shares its name with a capital of one of the original 13 states
